newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: VNU sees higher 1997 net profit.
newsitem.headline: VNU sees higher 1997 net profit.

text.p: Dutch publisher NV Verenigd Bezit VNU said on Tuesday it expected its net profit and ordinary earnings per share to rise in 1997.

VNU said it expected a "clear" increase in earnings this year from consumer magazines, educational publishing and Business Information Europe and a "significant" rise in earnings from newspapers and Business Information USA.
VNU said market conditions for commercial television remained "uncertain" but that it expected "some improvement" in results this year after a one million guilder loss in 1996.
